summary: Somehow replacing the ugly texture of eyevampire_02 (PC vampire eyes) with that of 01 caused CTD to me. I fixed that by doing a simple tweak in CK, which makes PC vampire eyes use eyevampire_01 texture.
descriptionHtml:
Somehow replacing the ugly texture of eyevampire_02 (PC vampire eyes) with that of 01 caused CTD to me, and the 02 eyes is a disgrace to my character.
I fixed that by doing a simple tweak in CK, which makes PC vampire eyes use eyevampire_01 texture, now my character looks better.

The eye texture used in "After" pic is from Seranaholic, but I don't know its origin, and neither do I care.
This mod will only make your PC vampire use eyevampire_01 texture, but doesn't provide one for its user.
You'll have to get yourÂ eyevampire_01 texture from The Eyes of Beauty, or whatever mod you favor.

And no, my mod doesn't change your characters' hair color.
author: kahasana
